dc_title_s: Dawson's map of the Dominion of Canada
dc_description_s: Shows railways, canals, and free grant lands.; Includes insets of "Continuation of map to the Pacific, showing British Columbia & Manitoba," "Environs of Montreal" (scale [ca. 1:950,000]), and "Newfoundland" (scale [ca. 1:3,200,000]).|57 x 86 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:2,400,000|General Map Collection
